title: [Tower of Knowledge, Nexus]
description: A crystal chandelier hangs from above, casting dim light on a rough ring of leather armchairs.  Vine-etched arches lead off in various directions, while their spandels depict wizards locked in battle with beasts from ages long past.  Nearly hidden behind a tapestry is a darkened alcove.
paths: Obvious exits: north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up
